title: Destiny
text: Weitzner has long been fascinated by universal archetypes. Inspiration for the  <I>Paradigm Collection<I> draws upon a number of basic concepts and their frequent relationship to geometric forms such as the spiral and its reference to growth and change, the triangle/diamond encouraging vision, and the stability inherent in the square.
description: Ornate damask swirling shapes overlaid with diamond shapes with eyelash edges.  Vert. Rpt. 27.5; horiz. Rpt. 11\". Garnet red. Garnet
